#summary Introduction to JOID.

JOID is an OpenID 2.0 Java library that lets you implement
providers as well as relying parties.

JOID compiles under JDK 1.4 or later.

There are two mailing lists. Feel free to join either:

|| *Type* || *URL* ||
|| General || http://groups.google.com/group/joid-general ||
|| Developer || http://groups.google.com/group/joid-dev ||
